mapper.select: /* ExampleRepository.selectExampleCount */ SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM KSF_EXAMPLE

/* ExampleRepository.selectExampleList */ SELECT b.EXAMPLE_BOARD_IDX, b.EXAMPLE_BOARD_TITLE, b.EXAMPLE_BOARD_CONTENT, b.EXAMPLE_BOARD_USE_YN, b.EXAMPLE_BOARD_CREATED_BY, b.EXAMPLE_BOARD_CREATED_DATE, a.ATTACH_IDX FROM KSF_EXAMPLE b LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ATTACH_REF_KEY, MAX(ATTACH_IDX) AS ATTACH_IDX FROM KSF_ATTACH a WHERE a.ATTACH_REF_TYPE = 'example' AND a.ATTACH_REF_MAP_CODE = 'attach' GROUP BY ATTACH_REF_KEY ) a ON b.EXAMPLE_BOARD_IDX = a.ATTACH_REF_KEY

/* ExampleRepository.selectExample */ SELECT EXAMPLE_BOARD_IDX, EXAMPLE_BOARD_TITLE, EXAMPLE_BOARD_CONTENT, EXAMPLE_BOARD_USE_YN, EXAMPLE_BOARD_CREATED_BY, EXAMPLE_BOARD_CREATED_DATE FROM KSF_EXAMPLE b WHERE EXAMPLE_BOARD_IDX = #{idx}
mapper.insert: /* ExampleRepository.insertExample */ INSERT INTO KSF_EXAMPLE ( EXAMPLE_BOARD_TITLE, EXAMPLE_BOARD_CONTENT, EXAMPLE_BOARD_USE_YN, EXAMPLE_BOARD_DEL_YN, EXAMPLE_BOARD_CREATED_BY, EXAMPLE_BOARD_CREATED_DATE, EXAMPLE_BOARD_IP ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{content}, #{useYn}, 'N', #{current.loginId}, #{current.dt}, #{current.ip} )
